Part Inferno, part Paradise Lost, and part Sunjiata epic, Song for Night is the story of a West African boy soldierÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s lyrical, terrifying, yet beautiful journey through the nightmare landscape of a brutal war in search of his lost platoon. The book is written in a ghostly voice, with each chapter headed by a line of the unique sign language these children invented. This book is unlike anything else ever written about an African war.
